item.title: 尽管关税存在不确定性，英国劳斯莱斯仍对目标充满信心
item.description: 英国工程公司罗尔斯-罗伊斯（Rolls-Royce）表示，尽管全球关税上涨带来了不确定性，但该公司仍有信心实现 2025 年的利润指导目标。【原文：British engineering company Rolls-Royce said it was confident of meeting 2025 profit guidance despite the uncertainty caused by global tariff rises.】

item.title: 中央人民广播电台称，美国关税将使荷兰经济增长减少一个百分点
item.description: 荷兰经济政策顾问 CPB 周四表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布的全面贸易关税将使荷兰到 2026 年的经济增长减少一个百分点。【原文：The sweeping trade tariffs announced by U.S. President Donald Trump would reduce economic growth in the Netherlands by a percentage point through 2026, Dutch economic policy adviser CPB said on Thursday.】

item.title: 国营媒体称美国已与中国就关税问题进行谈判
item.description: 隶属于中国国家广播公司中央电视台的社交媒体账号 "玉渊潭天 "周四称，特朗普政府已与中国接触，寻求就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普单挑中国政府征收145%关税一事进行谈判。【原文：The Trump administration has approached China seeking talks on U.S. President Donald Trump's singling Beijing out for 145% tariffs, said Yuyuan Tantian, a social media account affiliated with Chinese state broadcaster CCTV said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特斯拉董事长称董事会不会寻找新首席执行官接替马斯克
item.description: 特斯拉董事长罗宾-登霍尔姆（Robyn Denholm）周四表示，媒体关于董事会成员与招聘公司联系寻找新首席执行官接替埃隆-马斯克的报道是 "绝对错误的"。【原文：Tesla Chair Robyn Denholm on Thursday said the media report on board members reaching out to recruitment firms to look for a new CEO to replace Elon Musk was "absolutely false".】

item.title: VIEW 日本央行下调经济增长预期后，日元随日本国债收益率下滑
item.description: 日本央行周四下调了经济增长和通胀预期，同时在华盛顿咄咄逼人且反复无常的关税政策所带来的不确定性背景下避免加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan cut its growth and inflation forecasts on Thursday while refraining from raising interest rates against a backdrop of uncertainty created by Washington's aggressive and erratic tariff policies.】

item.title: 澳大利亚首富表示，大选临近，她希望进行特朗普式的改革
item.description: 矿业巨头吉娜-莱因哈特（Gina Rinehart）呼吁澳大利亚效仿美国，采取唐纳德-特朗普式的领导方式，削减政府开支，同时加强国防开支和能源安全。【原文：Mining magnate Gina Rinehart is calling for Australia to follow the U.S. lead by embarking on Donald Trump-style leadership to cut government largesse while boosting defence spending and energy security, as the country heads to the polls this weekend.】

item.title: 消息人士称，明治、Lactalis、Saputo、Warburg 可能参与恒天然 24 亿美元的出售竞标
item.description: 两位知情人士本周透露，包括日本明治、法国 Lactalis 集团和加拿大 Saputo 公司在内的公司正在考虑竞购乳业巨头恒天然正在寻求剥离的乳制品业务。【原文：Companies including Japan's Meiji, French group Lactalis and Canada's Saputo are considering bidding for the units dairy giant Fonterra is seeking to divest, two sources with knowledge of the matter said this week.】

item.title: 原住民组织称，力拓在朱伊坎事件五年后仍未履行核心承诺
item.description: 力拓集团（Rio Tinto）周四表示，力拓没有更新与一个原住民团体的协议，该团体在力拓开采铁矿石的土地上破坏了一个重要的原住民遗址，力拓未能履行五年前做出的承诺。【原文：Rio Tinto has not modernised its agreement with an Aboriginal group on whose lands it mines iron ore, failing to fulfil a commitment made five years ago when it destroyed an important Aboriginal heritage site, the group said on Thursday.】

item.title: 随着特朗普兴奋情绪的消退，加密货币行业降临迪拜
item.description: 加密货币爱好者们周三来到迪拜，聚集在海湾地区的烈日下，尽管有迹象表明围绕唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的加密货币立场的兴奋情绪正在消退，但他们还是希望该行业的兴旺情绪能够持续下去。【原文：Crypto enthusiasts descended on Dubai on Wednesday, gathering under the Gulf's scorching sun and hoping the industry's buoyant mood can keep going despite signs the euphoria around Donald Trump's crypto stance is ebbing.】

item.title: 部长称泰国将寻求与贸易竞争对手征收类似关税
item.description: 泰国财政部长周四表示，由于关税的影响，泰国经济预计会遇到暂时的 "气穴"，泰国计划通过谈判使其关税与贸易竞争对手的关税更加一致。【原文：Thailand's economy is expected to encounter temporary "air pockets" due to the impact of tariffs, the finance minister said on Thursday, and the country plans to negotiate to align its tariffs more closely with those of its trade competitors.】

item.title: 在做出液化天然气投资决定后，标普将伍德塞德公司的信用展望下调至 "负面
item.description: 周四，S&P 全球评级公司将澳大利亚伍德赛德公司（Woodside）的信用展望从 "稳定 "调整为 "负面"，此前该能源公司就其路易斯安那液化天然气项目作出了 175 亿美元的最终投资决定。【原文：S&P Global Ratings revised the credit outlook for Australia's Woodside to "negative" from "stable" on Thursday after the energy company reached a final investment decision of $17.5 billion on its Louisiana liquefied natural gas project.】

item.title: 报告称中国 4 月转售房屋价格下降，原因是待售房产增多
item.description: 中国一家房地产研究机构的报告称，由于更多住宅物业进入市场，加剧了购房者的竞争，4月份中国100个城市的转售住宅平均价格环比下降了0.7%。【原文：The average price of resale homes across 100 Chinese cities fell by 0.7% month-on-month in April, a report by a Chinese real estate research institute said, as more residential properties came onto the market boosting competition for buyers.】

item.title: 澳大利亚因黄金狂潮而对美国实现罕见贸易顺差
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策引发了黄金抢购热潮，使美国罕见的贸易顺差转为逆差，澳大利亚因此创下了三个月来对美出口的最好成绩。【原文：Australia has boasted its best three-month run of exports to the United States as President Donald Trump's tariff policies sparked a rush to buy gold, turning a rare U.S. trade surplus into a deficit.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，下调经济增长预期
item.description: 日本央行周四维持利率稳定并下调了经济增长预期，因为美国提高关税对全球需求的打击给日本脆弱的经济复苏前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady and slashed its growth forecasts on Thursday, as the hit to global demand from higher U.S. tariffs cloud the outlook for the country's fragile economic recovery.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，阿达尼暂停与以色列塔塔公司就 100 亿美元印度芯片业务的谈判
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的集团已暂停与以色列塔牌半导体公司（Tower Semiconductor）就价值 100 亿美元的芯片项目进行讨论，因为这对该集团没有战略和商业意义，两位熟悉此事的人士告诉路透社记者。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's group has paused discussions with Israel's Tower Semiconductor for a $10 billion chip project as it did not make strategic and commercial sense for the group, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：特斯拉董事会开始物色首席执行官接班人
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道，特斯拉董事会成员上个月联系了几家猎头公司，为首席执行官埃隆-马斯克寻找继任者。【原文：Tesla board members last month reached out to several executive search firms to look for a successor for CEO Elon Musk, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 美元喘息，日元静待日本央行
item.description: 由于投资者关注贸易战可能降温的迹象，美元摆脱了疲软的美国数据，周四持稳，而日元则在等待日本央行会议的召开。【原文：The dollar sloughed off weak U.S. data to steady on Thursday as investors focused on signs the trade war may be cooling down, while the yen was waiting on a central bank meeting in Japan.】

item.title: 供应忧虑导致油价下挫，油价喘了口气
item.description: 受沙特阿拉伯可能增产的迹象以及美国第一季度经济萎缩的影响，油价周四走高，在前一天大幅下跌后略有回稳。【原文：Oil prices edged higher on Thursday, steadying slightly after sharp losses on the previous day driven by signs Saudi Arabia could produce more, and as the U.S. economy contracted in the first quarter.】

item.title: 芯片需求强劲，韩国 4 月出口意外增长
item.description: 周四的贸易数据显示，在芯片销售强劲的带动下，韩国 4 月份的出口出人意料地增长，尽管汽车行业受到了美国关税的拖累。【原文：South Korea's exports surprisingly rose in April, led by strong chip sales, trade data showed on Thursday, although the auto sector was weighed by U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 库什塔德公司与日本 Seven & i 公司签署收购谈判保密协议
item.description: 加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司周三表示，该公司已与日本零售巨头 Seven & i 控股公司就收购要约签署了保密协议。【原文：Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard said on Wednesday that it has signed a non-disclosure agreement with Japanese retail giant Seven & i Holdings for its takeover offer.】

item.title: 电子邮件称拜耳将退出美国种子处理设备业务
item.description: 据路透社周三看到的一封发给客户的电子邮件称，拜耳正在退出美国的种子处理设备业务，以帮助公司改善财务状况。【原文：Bayer is exiting the seed treatment equipment business in the United States to help the company's finances, according to an email sent to customers that was seen by Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚伍尔沃斯第三季度销售额增长，原因是降价推动了销量增长
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的连锁超市伍尔沃斯集团（Woolworths Group）周四公布的第三季度销售额增长 3.2%，好于预期，原因是在充满挑战的零售环境中，降价促销提升了销量。【原文：Australia's largest supermarket chain Woolworths Group posted a better-than-expected 3.2% rise in third-quarter sales on Thursday, as price cuts lifted volumes in a challenging retail environment.】

item.title: 特朗普撤销关税后，英国公司老板信心上升
item.description: 一项调查显示，英国商界领袖对经济的乐观程度达到了自财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）发布秋季预算案以来的最高点，这表明美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）暂停征收关税的举措正在缓解人们的担忧。【原文：British business leaders have turned their most optimistic about the economy since before finance minister Rachel Reeves' autumn budget, according to a survey that suggested U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff pause was easing concerns.】

item.title: 美国法官裁定苹果违反改革 App Store 的命令
item.description: 美国加利福尼亚州的一名联邦法官周三裁定，苹果公司违反了美国法院要求这家 iPhone 制造商允许其利润丰厚的 App Store 在应用程序下载和支付方式方面加强竞争的命令，并将被移交联邦检察官处理。【原文：Apple violated a U.S. court order that required the iPhone maker to allow greater competition for app downloads and payment methods in its lucrative App Store and will be referred to federal prosecutors, a federal judge in California ruled on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普似乎暗示他比美联储鲍威尔更了解利率问题
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三似乎暗示，他比美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔更了解利率，应该降息。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday appeared to suggest he knew more about interest rates than Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell and that rates should be cut.】

item.title: 独家报道福特终止开发类似特斯拉电子脑的项目
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，福特汽车公司已经终止了一项开发下一代电气架构（现代汽车的大脑）的计划，该计划被福特高层称为与特斯拉等电动汽车先驱竞争的关键。【原文：Ford Motor has killed a program to develop next-generation electrical architecture - the brain of modern cars - that its executives have called pivotal to competing with electric-vehicle pioneers such as Tesla, three sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 恒大集团第一季度盈利受加州野火损失影响
item.description: 恒大集团（Everest Group）周三报告称，第一季度利润下降了 71%，原因是受到加州野火和其他灾难性索赔造成的承保损失的影响。【原文：Everest Group on Wednesday reported a 71% drop in first-quarter profit, hit by underwriting losses tied to California wildfires and other catastrophe-related claims.】

item.title: 季度业绩超预期后，Align 上调年度收入增长预期
item.description: 在牙科产品需求强劲的推动下，Align Technology 周三上调了年度营收增长预期。【原文：Align Technology raised annual revenue growth forecast on Wednesday after beating quarterly results, driven by strong demand for its dental products.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥分部第二季度消费回升
item.description: 沃尔玛财务总监周三表示，沃尔玛墨西哥分部的消费和人流量在第二季度开始回升。【原文：Consumption and foot traffic at Walmart's Mexico unit has begun to pick up in the second quarter, the firm's finance chief said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 大都会人寿第一季度利润因强劲的投资收益而增长；启动 30 亿美元回购计划
item.description: 受保费和投资收益增加的推动，保险商大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife）周三公布第一季度利润增长近 5%，并宣布回购股票。【原文：Insurer MetLife reported a nearly 5% rise in first-quarter profit on Wednesday, driven by higher premiums and investment income, and announced a share buyback.】
